annotation: <history><entry><input>ssh user@fedora-vm</input><output>Welcome to Fedora 38 (Workstation Edition)</output><annotation>Connecting to a Fedora 38 virtual machine via SSH.</annotation></entry><entry><input>hostnamectl</input><output>Static hostname: fedora-vm Icon name: computer-vm Chassis: vm Machine ID: 1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef Boot ID: abcdefgh-ijkl-mnop-qrst-uvwxyzabcdef Operating System: Fedora 38 (Workstation Edition) Kernel: Linux 6.0.5-200.fc38.x86_64 Architecture: x86-64</output><annotation>Checking the system's hostname and details using `hostnamectl`.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo dnf update -y</input><output>Last metadata expiration check: 1:23:45 ago on Wed Nov 15 12:34:56 2024. Dependencies resolved. Nothing to do. Complete!</output><annotation>Updating the package index using `dnf update`.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo dnf install -y curl</input><output>Dependencies resolved. =============================================================================== Package         Arch   Version              Repository                   Size =============================================================================== Installing: curl           x86_64 7.80.0-1.fc38    fedora  736 k</output><annotation>Installing `curl` to fetch data from the web.</annotation></entry><entry><input>curl -I https://www.example.com</input><output>HTTP/1.1 200 OK Date: Wed, 15 Nov 2024 12:35:00 GMT Server: Apache/2.4.48 (Ubuntu) Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8</output><annotation>Successfully using `curl` to fetch HTTP headers from a webpage.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo dnf install -y vim</input><output>Dependencies resolved. =============================================================================== Package         Arch   Version              Repository                   Size =============================================================================== Installing: vim            x86_64 8.2.2950-1.fc38  fedora  4.8 MB</output><annotation>Installing the `vim` text editor on the system.</annotation></entry><entry><input>vim --version</input><output>VIM - Vi IMproved 8.2 (2019 Dec 12, compiled Nov  1 2024 03:22:30) Included patches: 1-1000</output><annotation>Verifying the installation of `vim` by checking its version.</annotation></entry><entry><input>exit</input><output></output><annotation>Exiting the SSH session after completing the tasks.</annotation></entry></history>
